content: Hello, how has life been treating you lately ?
Every workday begins with me waking up feeling like I have a weight on my chest. I know this is not sustainable.
I hear you saying that a lot of work is stressful at the moment. That is certainly not fair. Does your work have anything you could do to make yourself feel better?
I understand. I have suffered from depression at work and it has made me feel very isolated. I know how awful it feels to be in a work situation.

situation: My anxiety over work is a constant black hole in my life.
